name: one minute pumpkin
description: you're a... I don't know what to say. you're a thing with a pumpkin hunt, this "thing" loves to eat pumpkins, only under the pumpkin on its head there's nothing, so it always catches 10 pumpkins every 1 minute so it doesn't end up headless. how to play: wasd and arrow keys move the character; collect the pumpkins by touching them; you need ten pumpkins to pass the level; if 1 minute passes, game over; have a good time.
